original_text: ‘I will always take care of Israel's people as my special nation. I will always cause the laws that rule everything to continue. I could never forget those laws, and I could never forget my people.’ ‘I will always take care of Israel's people as my special nation. I will always cause the laws that rule everything to continue. I could never forget those laws, and I could never forget my people.’ ‘I will always take care of Israel's people as my special nation. I will always cause the laws that rule everything to continue. I could never forget those laws, and I could never forget my people.’ ‘I will always take care of Israel's people as my special nation. I will always cause the laws that rule everything to continue. I could never forget those laws, and I could never forget my people.’ ‘I will always take care of Israel's people as my special nation. I will always cause the laws that rule everything to continue. I could never forget those laws, and I could never forget my people.’ ‘I will always take care of Israel's people as my special nation.
korean_text: 이 법도가 내 앞에서 폐할진대 이스라엘 자손도 내 앞에서 끊어져 영원히 나라가 되지 못하리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will always take care of Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 항상 이스라엘 백성을 돌볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will always cause the laws
I could never forget those laws
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 결코 그 법들을 잊을 수 없다

sentences.original_text: and I could never forget my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 결코 나의 백성을 잊을 수 없다
